src_text: Kabinete e ne e tshwere kopano ya yona ka Laboraro, la bo 24 Diphalane 2018, kwa Tuynhuys, MotsekapMerero ya ga Jaanong1.

src_text: Puo ya Pholisi ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Kgweditharo (MTBPS) Kabinete e amogetse Puo ya Pholisi ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Kgweditharo (MTBPS) ya ga Tona ya Matlole Tito Mboweni, e e ka ga maikano a a totobetseng a gore naga ya Aforika Borwa e ka nt hwafadiw MTBPS ya ngwaga wa 2018 e nopola ditshwetso tse di bokete tsa puso tse di mabapi le dikgwetlho tsa ikonomi le matlole tse di tobaneng le puso mo pakeng e e tlang ya dingwaga di le thar Maemo a ngwaga wa 2018 a kgolo ya ikonomi a lebilwe se wa go tloga mo
trg_text: Medium Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS) Cabinet welcomes the maiden MTBPS by Finance Minister Tito Mboweni, which is based on the strong conviction that South Africa can be renewe The 2018 MTBPS highlights the difficult economic and fiscal choices confronting government over the next three year Economic growth for 2018 has been revised down from

src_text: go bewa mo , mme maemo a tikologo mo lefatsheng a tswelela go gwetlha maemo a diikonomi tse di santseng di supog MTBPS ya ngwaga wa 2018 e naya sephuthelwana sa tsosoloso le kgodiso ya ikonomi sa ga Moporesitente bokao, e leng se se tla tobanang le tsetsepelo le tlhokomelo ya matlol Puso e tswelela go samagana le tsetsepelo ya matlole, le fa go le jalo go setse go dirilwe diphosonyana di se kae fa e sale go rebolwa Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya ngwaga wa 2018 ka Tlhakole monongwag Puso e tswelela go samagana le go laola sekoloto sa naga le go ka se fokots Le fa re tobane le matsapa a ikonomi le matlole, kabo ya matlole e e tshitshingtsweng e tswelela go baya kwa setlhoeng manaane a a tobaneng le merero ya loago a a tshegetsang thuto, boitekanelo, tlhokomelo ya loago, metsi le kgeleloleswe mmogo le ditirelo tsa motlakase Samiti ya Moporesitente e e ka ga Boitekanelo Kabinete e amogetse dipoelo tsa Samiti ya Moporesitente e e ka ga Boitekanelo tseo maitlhomo a tsona e leng go rarabolola dikgwetlho tse di farologaneng tse di tobaneng le thulaganyo ya ditirelo tsa boitekanelo jwa pus Dipoelo tseno di tla matlafatsa ipaakanyetso ya go tsenya tirisong In orense ya Boset haba ya Boitekanelo (NHI) Pusetso ya dinaga Kabinete e amogetse manaane a a ka ga pusetso ya dinaga a a tsweletseng go diragadiwa a a tsosolosang seriti le go phimola dikeledi tsa bao mo malobeng ba diretsweng diphoso mmogo le go thusa go ka godisa ikonom Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o ne a eteletse pele mokete o o ka ga pusetso ya dinaga, moo diheketara di feta di le 4 586 tsa lefatshe di buseditsweng baagi ba kwa KwaMkhwanazi kwa Empangeni, KwaZulu-Nata Baagi ba kwa KwaMkhwanazi ba tla neelwa gape le diphuthelwana morago ga moletlo mmogo le tshegetso e leng tse di tla ba thusang go oketsa lehumo le le tlang le lefatsh Seno se tla dira gore baagi bano ba nne le naga e e tla ba kgontshang gore ba se tlhole ba lemela go iphepa mme ba lemele go rekisetsa batho le beng ba dikgwebo go ralala le lethathama lotlhe la dithekiso mo nageng ya bobon Puso e ikemiseditse go tshegetsa tsetsepelo ya dikgwebo tsa temothuo, mme tsone di akaretsa diporojeke di le 262 tse di tsamaelanang le tsa pusetso ya dinaga mo ba wa le basadi e tla nnang bone ba ba unngwelwang go ralala le diporofense tsotlhe Go sengwa ga mafaratlhatlha a set haba Kabinete e tlhagisitse matshwenyego a yona mabapi le go sengwa ga mafaratlhatlha a set hab Ditiragalo tseno di nyatsa maikano a puso a go isa ditirelo kwa metseng eo mo malobeng e neng a beetswe kwa thok Ga go dingongorego dipe tse di ka tlhotlheletsang gore mafaratlhatlha a set haba a sengw Go sengwa gono ga mafaratlhatlha ke maiteko a go senyeletsa batho ba ba humanegileng le go ba utswetsa ditirelo tse ba di tlhokang that Kabinete e ipiletsa mo baaging go ntsha matlho dinameng le go dirisana mmogo le ditheo tsa molao mo go golegeng bao ba nang le seabe mo ntlheng en Kabinete gape e nopotse gore Setlhopha sa Bosiamisi, Thibelobosenyi le Tshireletsego se tla samagana le ntlha eno ka mo go tshwanetsen 5.
trg_text: to , and the global environment remains challenging for emerging market economie The 2018 MTBPS gives effect to the President s growth economic stimulus and recovery plan, which will be underpinned by fiscal and monetary stabilit Government remains committed to fiscal sustainability, but there has been slippage since the tabling of the 2018 Budget in February this yea Government remains committed to stabilizing and bringing down deb Against the backdrop of a difficult economic and fiscal environment, the proposed division of revenue continues to prioritise large social spending programmes that support basic education, health, social welfare, water, sanitation and electricity services Presidential Health Summit Cabinet welcomes the outcomes of the Presidential Health Summit which aim to address the various challenges facing the public health syste The outcomes will strengthen the preparations for the implementation of the National Health Insurance

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse mokgwa o mont hwa wa go thapa NDP Moporesitente Ramaphosa o thapile Phanele ya Boeletsi gore e nopole le go tshwara dikopano tsa go senka tiro le bao e bonang ba le matshwanedi a go ka okama setilo tsa Tlhogo ya Bothati jwa Bot hot hisi jwa Boset haba (NPA).
trg_text: National Director of Public Prosecutions (NDPP) appointment process Cabinet welcomed the new approach of appointing the NDP President Ramaphosa appointed the Advisory Panel to identify and conduct interviews with individuals worthy of consideration to occupy the position of the Head of the National Prosecuting Authorit The panel convened for the first time this week and is expected to submit shortlisted names to the President by 7 December 2018.

src_text: Panele eno e kopane lwantlha mo bekeng eno fa e sale e tlhomiwa mme go solofetswe gore e tla romela maina a batho ba e ba beileng leitlho kwa go Moporesitente ka la bo 7 Sedimonthole 2018.
trg_text: South African International Investment ConferencePresident Ramaphosa will on Friday, 26 October 2018, preside over South Africa s inaugural Investment Conference at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesbur This is part of a combination of efforts to attract investments and grow our econom Additionally, the four investment envoys who were appointed by the President will report back to the conference on progress mad Group of Twenty (G20) SummitPresident Ramaphosa has been invited by the Federal Chancellor of Germany, Dr Angela Merkel, to participate in the G20 Investment Summit

src_text: Katlholo ya Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo Kabinete e atlhaatlhile katlholo ya Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo e e mabapi le gore batho ba bagolo ba ka dirisa, ba jala le go tshwara motekwane go ka o dirisetsa mabaka bona mmogo le seabe sa katlholo e Baagi ba lopiwa gore ba buise le go tlhaloganya katlholo eno ka ntlha ya gore go dirisa motekwane fa gare ga batho ga go a letlelelw Mo godimo ga seno, katlholo eno ga e a re go rekisa motekwane ga e sa le tlolo ya mola Kabinete e a dumela gore katlholo eno e bonwa jaaka melao e mengwe e e leng teng e e ka ga tiriso, go tshwara le go jala motekwan Kabinete mo ntlheng eno e santse e gakololwa mabapi le seno Samiti e e mabapi le Pabalesego kwa Dikolong Kabinete e amogetse Samiti e e neng e tshwerwe mo malobeng e e mabapi le Pabalesego kwa Dikolong e e neng e gogwa kwa pele ke Tona ya Thuto ya Motheo mme Angie Motshekg Samiti eno e bokeleditse bannaleseabe mo mererong ya thuto le ba ba senang seabe mo mererong eno go ka mekamekana le ditharabololo mabapi le dikgwetlho tsa pabalesego tse di tobaneng le dikolo tsa ka fa nageng mmogo le go simolola go aga ditikologo tse di babalesegileng kwa dikolon Seno se latela dintwa tse di nang le go runya kwa dikolong tse dingwe, go akaretsa le
trg_text: Constitutional Court JudgementCabinet deliberated on the Constitutional Court Judgement on the use, cultivation and possession of cannabis by an adult person in private for his/her personal consumption and its impac Members of the public are requested to familiarise themselves with the judgement as the use of cannabis in a public place is prohibite Furthermore, the judgement did not decriminalise the dealing in cannabiCabinet acknowledges that the judgement exists in the context of other laws which may be applicable to the use, possession and cultivation of cannabi

src_text: morutabana wa dingwaga di le 24 yo a wetsweng ke dintelo, Rre Gadimang Daniel Mokolobate, yo a bolailweng ka thipa setlhogo ke morutwana kwa sekolong sa Ramotshere Secondary fa Zeerust, kwa Bokone Bophirim Bannaleseabe botlhe ba a dumelana gore tirisodikgoka ya mefuta yotlhe, bogolosegolo kwa dikolong, ga e a dumelesega leeseng le gore go tshwanetse go nna le tirisanommogo go tlala seatla go netefatsa gore kwa dikolong go rena pabalesego mo barutwaneng le mo barutabaneng Ditlhatlhobo tsa materiki
trg_text: Cabinet is taking advice on the matter School Safety Summit Cabinet welcomes the recently held School Safety Summit hosted under the leadership of Basic Education Minister Angie Motshekg The summit brought together education and external stakeholders to find solutions to safety issues facing the country s schools as well as to pave the way forward for safer environments in school This follows incidents of violence at some schools, including the tragic death of the 24-year-old teacher, Mr Gadimang Daniel Mokolobate, who was fatally stabbed by a learner at the Ramotshere Secondary School in Zeerust, North Wes All stakeholders agreed that violence in general, and in schools in particular, is not acceptable and that further cooperation is required to ensure that schools become safer for both learners and teachers Matric exams Cabinet wishes all learners, especially Grade 12 learners, well over this perio For the first time, the department will this year also administer an examination in South African Sign Language at Home Language level to 58 deaf candidates across 10 school The examination extends over five-and-a-half weeks and will conclude on 28 Novembe Learners across the country will also sign a voluntary pledge to commit to upholding the integrity of the examinations by not participating in any malpractic Parents and guardians are encouraged to support learners during this critical period in their academic journe It is also vital to motivate learners to finish their schoolin Cabinet decisions9.

src_text: Kabinete e lakaletsa barutwana botlhe, bogolosegolo ba ba samaganeng le ditlhatlhobo tsa bona tsa mophato wa bo 12, masego le matlhogonol Lekgetlho lwa ntlha monongwaga lefapha le tla bo le samagane le ditlhatlhobo tsa Puo ya Diatla ya Aforika Borwa mabapi le maemo a Puo ya Gae mo barutwaneng ba le 58 ba ba dirisang puo ya diatla mo dikolong di le 10.

src_text: Ditlhatlhobo tseno di tla goga sebaka sa dibeke di le tlhano le halofo mme di tla konosela ka la bo 28 Ngwanaitseele 2012.
trg_text: This coincides with the Cabinet Programme of Action Reporting Wee The Imbizo Focus Week will provide a platform for members of the National Executive as well as provincial and local government leaders to undertake community meetings and Izimbizo countrywide, over this period, to demonstrate government s implementation of the 2014-2019 Medium Term Strategic Framework and to respond to issues being raised by citizens, which impact on the safety, growth and development of our communitieThe two weeks of activism takes place against the backdrop of celebrations of the centenaries of Struggle icons Mama Albertina Sisulu and Tata Nelson Mandela, both of whom epitomised the value of regular consultation and interaction with the communities they serve

src_text: Dipoelo tsa go oketsa maikarabelo, gareng ga tse dingwe, di tla kgontsha gore go nne le tlhabololo mo bojanaleng jwa mafelo a tlhago le mo go tsholetseng phitlhelelo ya bolaodi jwa tlhokomelo ya metswedi mabapi le boreatlhapi jwa makala a a potlan Tshitshinyo eno ya go okediwa ga maikarabelo e latela dipuisanelo magareng ga bannaleseabe botlhe ba ba maleb Di-MPA di tla phasaladiwa ka fa Kaseteng ya Pus Kabinete e amogetse Lenaanetiro la Naga (NAP) la Bobedi la Aforika Borwa le le Kwalolotsweng Se wa le go Lepalepanngwa Sentle go ka Lwantshana le Komelelo, Tirisobotlhaswa ya Lefatshe le go Lwantsha Seabe sa Komelelo (2018-2030).Maitlhomo a NAP ke go tsenya letsogo mo pabalelong le mo tshomarelong ya tiriso ya naga ya rona le mo tlhokomelong ya metswedi ya rona ya tlhagAforika Borwa e utlwanetse semmuso Tumelano ya Dinagakopano (UN) e e ka ga go Lwantsha Kakafalo ya 1997.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Children s Amendment Bill in the Government Gazette for public comment The Bill seeks to strengthen coordination of the child-care and protection system through interdepartmental and intersectoral collaboratio The amendments respond to the North Gauteng High Court Judgement of November 2017, wherein the Department of Social Development was ordered to prepare and introduce the necessary amendments to the Children s Act, 2005 (Act 38 of 2005) in respect to the legal solution towards the management of the foster-care syste Cabinet approved the introduction of the Postal Services Amendment Bill to Parliamen The Bill gives effect to the National Integrated ICT Policy White Paper that was approved by Cabinet in September 2016.The intended outcomes are to have a competitive, viable and sustainable South African Post Office that provides/facilitates universal services and access as well as the transformation of the postal secto The Bill also provides an approach to assigning physical addresses to rural and traditional communitieThis Bill has already gone through public consultatio Upcoming events13.

src_text: Malebana le Karolo ya bo 9 ya tumelano eno, maphata a a e leng karolo ya tumelano eno a tshwanetse go kwala, go baakanyetsa le go tsenya tirisong NAP jaaka karolo e e botlhokwa ya togamaano ya go lwantshana le kakafalo le go ka thibela ditlamorago tsa komelel Aforika Borwa e kwadile NAP ya yona ya ntlha ka ngwaga wa 2004.
trg_text: In accordance with Article 9 of the convention, parties are required to develop, prepare and implement a NAP as the central element of the strategy to combat desertification and mitigate the effects of drough South Africa developed its first NAP in 2004.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore go phasaladiwe mo Kaseteng ya Puso Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Bana gore baagi ba dire ditshwaelo ka on Molaotlhomo ono maitlhomo a ona ke go matlafatsa taolo ya tlhokomelo ya bana le thulaganyo ya pabalesego ka tirisano ya mafapha le ya makal Dikarolo tseno tse di kwalolotsweng se wa di tsibogela Katlholo e e rebotsweng ke Kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Bokone jwa kwa Gauteng ya Ngwanaitseele 2017, mo Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago le laetsweng gore le kwale le go tsenya tirisong dikarolo tse di matshwanedi tse di kwalolotsweng se wa tsa Molao wa Bana wa ngwaga wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2005) go latela ditharabololo tsa semolao tse di totileng bolaodi jwa thulaganyo ya mafelo a tlhokomelo ya bana ba ba tlhokang tlhokomel Kabinete e amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Ditirelo tsa Poso o tlisiwe kwa Palamenteng go tsenngwatirison Molaotlhomo ono o dira gore Pholisi ya Lokwalotemoso lwa Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano le Tshedimosetso (ICT) e e atlenegisitsweng ke Kabinete ka Lwetse 2016 e nne mosolDipoelo tse di lebeletsweng ke go nna le Kantoroposo ya Aforika Borwa e e gaisanang le tse dingwe, e atlega le go somarelega mme e abelana ka ditirelo tsa lefatshe ka bophara tsa poso e bile e fitlhelesega mmogo le go refosana taolo mo lekaleng la dipos Molaotlhomo ono gape o tlamela ka kgato e e tla tlamelang malapa a kwa metseselegae le a segosi ka diaterese tsa bodulMolaotlhomo ono o setse o atlhaatlhiw Ditiragalo tse di Tlang13.
trg_text: Cabinet congratulates the Minister of Health, Dr Aaron Motsoaledi, who received two prestigious Kochon prizes, at an award ceremony held at The Hague, The Netherland The first prize is in the Minister s individual capacity for his role and political leadership in the fight against tuberculosis (TB) globallThe second prize, which the Minister will share with the Right Honourable Nick Hebert, Member of Parliament (MP) in the United Kingdom, will be in their capacity as co-chairs of the Global TB Caucus of MPs from all over the worl The Kochon Prize is awarded annually to individuals and/or organisations that have made a significant contribution to combating TB either in their countries or globall Cabinet welcomes the World Travel Awards 2018 which voted South Africa as Africa s Leading Destinatio Durban in KwaZulu-Natal was also recognised as Africa s Leading City Destination and scooped the prestigious title of Africa s Leading Cruise Por Cape Town, in the Western Cape landed the title of Africa s Leading Festival and Event Destinatio Cabinet welcomes the premiering of a local film titled Nommer 37 by film-maker Joshua Bradley in the United States on 2 November 2018.

src_text: Khonferense ya Aforika Borwa e e mabapi le Dipeeletso tsa Dinaga tsa Bodit habat habaMoporesitente Ramaphosa
trg_text: Friend of South Africa .

src_text: ka Labotlhano, la bo 26 Diphalane 2018, o tla etelapele Khonferense e e mabapi le Dipeeletso tsa Dinaga tsa Bodit habat haba kwa Sandton Convention Centre mo Johannesbur Seno ke karolo ya matsapa a a kopantsweng go ka ngokela dipeeleso le go ka godisa ikonomi ya ron Mo godimo ga seno, barongwa ba le bane ba ba tsomanang le dipeeletso ba ba romilweng ke Moporesitente ba tla boa ba begela khonferense ka kgatelopele e ba setseng ba e diril Samiti ya Dinaga di le Someamabedi (G20)Moporesitente Ramaphosa o laleditswe ke Mokhanselara wa Federei ene ya Jeremane, Ngaka Angela Merkel, gore a tsee karolo mo Samiting ya G20
trg_text: German Business and the Compact with Africa (CwA) Countries, and a Business Roundtable, both of which will be held in Berlin, Germany on 30 October 2018.The G20 Investment Summit will bring together German business and CwA Countries to explore investment opportunities under the framework of the G20 Partnership with Afric German investors will present flagship projects currently undertaken in the CwA Countries and explore further opportunities on the continen The President will attend the summit in the capacity of Co-Chair of the G20 Africa Advisory GrouThe G20 Conference on the CwA will focus on ways in which the G20, African countries and development institutions can cooperate to promote private investment and economic participation in African state The meeting will also undertake preparatory work in this field for the G20 Summit in Buenos Aires, Argentin National Imbizo Focus WeekMembers of the Executive will participate in the GCIS s 9th National Imbizo Focus Week of the fifth democratic administration, which will take place from 12 to 25 November 2018.

src_text: Kopano ya Kutlwano magareng ga Dikgwebo tsa kwa Jeremane le Dinaga tsa Aforika (CwA), mmogo le Kopano ya Maphata a Kgwebo, ka bobedi di tla tshwarelwa kwa Jeremane ka la bo 30 Diphalane 2018.Samiti ya Dipeeletso ya G20 e tla bokeletse dikgwebo tsa kwa Jeremane le Dinaga tsa CwA go ka sekaseka dit hono tse go ka beelediwang mo go tsone go latelwa letlhomeso la Tirisanommogo ya
trg_text: The crime thriller set in the Cape Flats was funded by the Department of Trade and Industry through its South African Emerging Black Filmmakers Incentive schem This will contribute in attracting foreign direct investment into the South African film industrCondolences19.

src_text: G20 le Aforik Babeeletsi ba kwa Jeremane ba tla tla ka diporojeke tse di botlhokwa tse di setseng di rebotswe mo dinageng tsa CwA le go sekaseka dit hono tse dingwe gape mo kontinenten Moporesitente o tla tsenela samiti a tsorame maemo a Monnasetulommogo wa G20 mo Setlhopheng sa Baeletsi sa Aforika BorwKhonferense ya G20 ka ga CwA e tla tsepamisa mogopolo wa yona mo mekgweng eo G20, dinaga tsa CwA mmogo le ditheo tsa tlhabololo di ka dirisanang mmogo ka teng go tsholetsa dipeeletso tsa ditheo tsa poraefete le go nna e seabe mo mererong ya ikonomi ya dinaga tsa Aforik Kopano eno gape e tla samagana le ditiro tsa ipaakanyetso mo karolong ya Samiti ya G20 e e tla tshwarelwang kwa Buenos Aires, kwa nageng ya Argentin Beke ya Mtsholo a Naga a ImbizoMaloko a khuduthamaga a tla tsaya karolo mo letsholong la bo robongwe la GCIS la Beke ya Matsholo a Naga a Imbizo a puso ya botlhano ya temokerasi, e e tla tshwarwang go simolola ka la bo 12 go fitlha ka la bo 25 Ngwanaitseele 2018.

src_text: Kabinete e akgola Tona ya Boitekanelo, Ngaka Aaron Motsoaledi, yo a neetsweng dikapo di le pedi tsa Kochon, kwa moketeng o o neng o tshwaretswe kwa Hague, kwa Netherland Kabo eno e akgola seabe sa ga Tona mo maikarabelong a gagwe le mo boiteledipeleng jwa gagwe jwa sepolotiko mo go lwantsheng lehuba (TB) mo lefatsheng ka bopharKabo ya bobedi eo Tona a tla e abelwang mmogo le tokololo ya mokgatlo wa sepolotiki wa Right, Motlotlegi Nick Hebert, yo e leng Tokololo ya Palamente (MP) kwa nageng ya kwa United Kingdom, e tla nna mo diatleng tsa bona ba le babedi jaaka e le bannasetulommogo ba Kopano ya di-MP tsa Lefatshe e e ka ga TB go ralala lefatshe lotlh Kabo eno ya Kochon e abiwa ngwaga le ngwaga batho kgotsa mekgatlho e e dirileng go tlala seatla mo go lwantsheng TB mo nageng ya bona kgotsa kwa dinageng tse dingw Kabinete e amogetse Dikabo tsa Lefatshe tsa go Tsaya Maeto tsa 2018 tseo di nopotseng Aforika Borwa jaaka e nngwe ya dinaga tse di di gogang kwa pel Durban kwa KwaZulu-Natal le yona e nopotswe jaaka teropokgolo e e di gogang kwa pele mme yona e fentse sekgelele sa teropokgolo e e di gogang kwa pele momaemong a mafelo a boemelak Motsekapa, kwa Kapa Bophirima e fentse dikabo tsa go nna Lefelo le le gogang kwa pele ditiragalo le Meket Kabinete e amogetse go tshamekiwa ga dikgatiso tsa filimi ya ka fa nageng e e bidiwang Nommer 37 e e dirilweng ke Joshua Bradley kwa Amerika ka la bo 2 Ngwanaitseele 2018.
trg_text: Cabinet joins President Ramaphosa in expressing sadness and condolences:1 at the tragic passing away of more than 27 people, in a multiple vehicle accident on the N1 North in Limpop Road users are urged to exercise caution on our roads and must ensure that they obey the rules of the road at all timesat the passing of Struggle icon, Mama Agnes Msiman

src_text: Filimi eno e e buang ka bosenyi e diretswe kwa Cape Flats mme e tlametswe ka matlole ke ba Lefapha la Kgwebisano le Intaseteri (dti) ka sekema sa yona sa Merokotso ya Aforika Borwa ya go Tlamela ka Matlole Badiri ba Difilimi ba Bathobatsho ba ba Santseng ba Supog Seno se tla thusa go ngokela babeeletsi ba dinaga tsa kwantle go beeletsa mo intasetering ya difilimi ya Aforika BorwMelaetsa ya Matshediso19.
trg_text: Mama Msimang was a committed gender activist and former Deputy President of the African National Congress (ANC) Women s Leagu

trg_text: Cabinet approved South Africa s Revised and Aligned Second National Action Programme (NAP) to Combat Desertification, Land Degradation and Mitigate the Effects of Drought (2018-2030).

src_text: E ne e le wa ba bangwe ba basadi ba tlhoka palo ba ba neng ba kopantse metse ya bona go ralala le naga ya Aforika Borwa kgatlhanong le Puso ya Tlhaolel O tla fitlhwa ka Labotlhano, la bo 26 Diphalane 2018.
trg_text: The NAP seeks to contribute towards the conservation and sustainable use of our land and other natural resourceSouth Africa ratified the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification in 1997.

src_text: Mtshaligo tlhokafala ga mokgaratlhi wa ANC Rre Moss Chikan Rre Chikane e nnile Tokololo ya Palamente ka ngwaga wa 1994 morago ga gore naga e iponele ditlhopo tsa yona tsa temokerasi tsa ntlh Ka ngwaga wa 2005, o ne a thapiwa jaaka Moambasatara wa naga ya Aforika Borwa go e emela kwa nageng ya Jeremanebaagi ba kwa nageng ya Sweden mmogo le ba lelapa go latela go tlhokafala ga Mme Lisbet Palme
